get.description: Search packages

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: the type of packages to show `popular`, `promoted`

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: the max distance to search (in meters) from longitude, latitude

get.description: Search provders

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: the sort field. Allowed `popularity`, `date`, `price`. Default order is ascending. Prefix with `-` for descending order e.g. `-price`.

parameters.name: maxDistance
parameters.description: the max distance to search (in meters) from longitude, latitude

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: the keyword to search (matches many fields)

parameters.description: the sort field. Allowed `serialNumber`, `name`, `type`, `mileage`. Default order is ascending. Prefix with `-` for descending order e.g. `-name`
